text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale! Unkal) etirikalukku utavi ceyta vetakkarar(kalakiya yutar)kalai avarkalutaiya aranmanaikaliliruntu irankavaittu avarkalutaiya ullankalil (titukkattaiyum) natukkattaiyum pottuvittan. Akave, avarkalil oru tokaiyinarai ninkal vetti vittirkal; marroru tokaiyinarai ninkal cirai pitittirkal
